name: Angelos Roumpesi
story: Born and raised in a small village in Greece, Theofilos grew up with a strong sense of duty and loyalty. He joined the Hellenic Army at a young age and quickly proved himself to be a skilled soldier. He was recruited by BLUFOR for his marksmanship skills and now serves as an autorifleman. Though he misses his home and family, he is proud to be serving his country in the international coalition.
